name: NV-Stats
description: Real-time NVIDIA GPU statistics: utilization, memory, temperature, and fan speed
author: chesterbait88
comments:
A lightweight, highly customizable Cinnamon applet for monitoring NVIDIA GPU statistics.

REQUIREMENTS:
- NVIDIA GPU with proprietary drivers
- nvidia-smi command-line utility (included with NVIDIA drivers)
- Cinnamon Desktop Environment 4.0+

VERIFY REQUIREMENTS:
Run 'which nvidia-smi' to check if nvidia-smi is installed.
Run 'nvidia-smi dmon -c 1' to verify it's working.

TROUBLESHOOTING:
If errors occur, check the log file at:
~/.xsession-errors

Search for 'NV-Stats' or 'GPU Monitor' in the log:
tail -100 ~/.xsession-errors | grep -i 'nv-stats'

For issues and support, visit:
https://github.com/chesterbait88/nv-stats/issues
